utterance.speaker: Joey

utterance.content: What song was that, Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Mon!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Mon!

utterance.content: Oh my God, has she slept at all?

utterance.content: Nope.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, it's been three nights in a row.

utterance.content: Yeah, she finally stopped crying yesterday, but then she found one of Richard's cigar butts out on the terrace, so.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay that explains it. I got a call at two in the morning, but all I could hear was, like, this high squeaky sound, so I thought okay its like a mouse or a opossum. But then I realized where would a mouse or a opossum get the money to make the phone call.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Morning.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Morning, hey, you made pancakes?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, like there's any way I could ever do that.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Monica and Rachel had syrup, now I can get my man to cheer up. Good morning Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Good morning.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, you know what, here's a thought. Why don't you stay home from work today and just hang out with me.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh, I wish. Look, honey, you have that report to finish, and I gotta go see my lawyer.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can not believe that I am going out with someone that is getting divorced. I'm such a grown up.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I-I-I gotta go, I gotta go. Okay, not without a kiss.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, maybe I won't kiss you, and then you'll have to stay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Kiss her! Kiss her!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I'll see you later, sweetie. Bye Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: B-bye Janice. So when ya' dumpin' her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nope, not this time.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on, quite yankin' me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm not yanking you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is Janice.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I know. She makes me happy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. All right. You look me in the eye and tell me, without blinking, that you're not breaking up with her. No blinking.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm not breaking up with her!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: God, look what I found in the drain.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's some of Richard's hair! What do I do with this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Getting it away from me would be job one.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's weird, but you know what I don't wanna throw this away. I mean this is like all I have left of him, gross, drain hair. Ooh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh. Oh. It looks like, like a tiny little person drowning in your cereal.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: God, what is wrong with me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You need to get some sleep.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I need to get some Richard.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, you broke up with him for a reason.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know, I know. I'm just so tired of-of missing him. I'm tired of wondering why hasn't he called. Why hasn't he called!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe, because you told him not to.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you the memory woman?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Their not breaking up. Chandler and Janice. Their not breaking up. He didn't blink or anything.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, you know I'm not surprised. I mean have you seen them together, they're really cute.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Cute! This is Janice! You remember Janice?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, Joey, I remember, she's annoying, but you know what she's-she's his girlfriend now. I mean what can we do?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: There you go! That's the spirit I'm looking for! What can we do? Huh? All right who's first? Huh? Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well I'm thinking that Chandler's our friend and Janice makes him happy, so I say we just all be adult about it and accept her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, we'll call that Plan B. All right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, I was wondering....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmm?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you still have that, um, Navy uniform?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nooo, I had to return it to the costume place.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think I have an old band uniform from high school.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You remember not having sex in high school, right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well honey, what about you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean do you have any fun, you know, fantasy type things?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on you gotta have one!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nope.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, you know what...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ...if you tell me, I might do it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, umm. Did you ever see, um, Return Of The Jedi?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do you remember the scene with, um, Jabba the Hut? Well Jabba had as, as his prisoner, um, Princess Leia.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oooh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Princess Leia, was wearing this, um, gold bikini thing. It was pretty cool.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, oh, Princess Leia and the gold bikini, every guy our age loved that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Um, um. It's huge. Yeah, that's the moment, when-when, you know she stopped being a princess, and became, like, a woman, you know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Did you ever do the-the Leia thing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, um-mm. Oh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really! That-that great huh?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No it's just that I got this new pager and I have it on vibrate. See ya!

utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi you guys!

utterance.content: Mon. Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.content: Why aren't you at work?

utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.content: Of!

utterance.content: You know, you should really go on this show. All right, listen, I got three tickets to the Rangers tonight. What'd ya' say?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I say, 'I am there!' Cool! Aw, is Ross going to?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, Janice.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Jan-ice. 'Cause I, just, I feel bad for Ross, you know, we-we always go together, we're like the three hocke-teers.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know, I may be way out on a limb here, but do you, do you, have a problem with Janice?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, Yeeees. God, how do I say this. . Oh, hi, you know that girl from the Greek restaurant with the hair ?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooh, that girl that I hate, eww, drives me crazy, eww, eww, oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, I don't hate Janice, she's-she's just a lot to take, you know.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, there you go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hey. Come on man, don't look at me like that, she used to drive you nuts before too, remember?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I'm crazy about her now. I think this could be the real thing. Capital 'R'! Capital 'T'! Don't worry, those are the right letters.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, what do you want me to say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I want you to say that you like her!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can't. It's like this chemical thing, you know. Every time she starts laughing, I just wanna pull my arm off just so that I can have something to throw at her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks for trying. Oh, and by the way there is no Count Rushmore!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, then-then who's the guy that painted the faces on the mountain?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How could you have told her?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, I didn't think it would that big of a deal.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, she didn't think it would be that big of deal.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, who are you talking to when you do that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, that was supposed to be like a private, personal thing between us.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, Ross, Phoebe is my girlfriend, okay, we tell each other everything. You know, I mean, come on, guys do the same thing, I mean, what about all that locker room stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's different, okay. That's like, uh 'Who dated a stripper?' or 'Who did it on the back of the Staton Island Ferry?'.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Were both of those Joey?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Look, you don't, you don't talk about like, you know, your girlfriend and the intimate stuff you, you do with her.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Not even with your best friend.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Noo!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That is so sad. Your missing out on so much, Ross. I mean, the bonding and the sharing, you know. And-and knowing that someone else is going through the same thing you are.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmph. So what you, you tell each other everything?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pretty much.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did you talk about the night of five times? Do you tell people about the night of five times?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, honey, yeah that was with Carol.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know, but it's still worth mentioning, I think.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Relax every muscle in your body. Listen to the plinky-plunky music. Okay, now close you eyes, and think of a happy place. Okay, tell me your happy place.

utterance.content: Richard's living room, drinking wine.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right. No, no, no, not a Richard thing, just put down the glass. And get out!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm sorry, but that's my happy place.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, okay, fine, use my happy place. Okay, I'm just gonna, I have to ask that you don't move anything.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, I'll try not to.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, all right, so, your in a meadow, millions of stars in the sky....

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you think breaking up with him was a huge mistake?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, there are no questions in the happy place. Okay, just, the warm breeze, and the moonlight flowing through the trees....

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'll bet he's totally over me, I'll bet he's fine.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, betting and wagering of any kind, are, I'm sure, not permitted in the happy place. Okay. Just-just, you know, the-the lovely waterfalls, and the, the trickling fountains. And the-the calming sounds of the babbling brook....

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, this isn't working. I'm still awake and now I have to pee.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: So, I hear, you hate me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I, ah, I never said hate, I was very careful about that.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: A little birdie told me something about you wanting to rip your arm off and throw it at me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And you got a 'hate' from that?! Your taking a big leap there...

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: All right, fine, fine, fine, fine, fine, we've got to do something about our little situation here Joey. So, this is my idea: you and me spending some quality time together.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But what does that gonna do...

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: For Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. I'm in.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Okay. All right. This is what we're gonna call it: 'Joey and Janice's DAY OF FUN!'

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Does it have to be a whole day?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Yes, because that's how long it takes to love me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I know, I sleep in the next room.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, I went down to the post office, and it turns out it was those videos that I ordered for Richard about the Civil War. He loved the Civ)l War.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica, do you want us to take you home?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, huh. Or maybe to a galaxy far, far away.

utterance.content: Women tell each other everything. Did you know that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Umm, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No Chandler, everything! Like stuff you like, stuff she likes, technique, stamina, girth....

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Girth? Why, why, why, wh-why, why, why, why would they do this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel says sharing's great and supposedly, you know, we outta be doing it. Do you wanna?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We're not gonna talk about girth are we?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nooo!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah! All right! You go first.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay, I'll go first.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, uh, the other night Rachel and I are in bed talking about fantasies, and I happened to describe a particular Star Wars thing....

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Princess Leia in the gold bikini.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.content: Yes! Wow, well, that-that was easy. Okay, you-you go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, you know, you know when your in bed, with a woman.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmph.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And, ah, you know, your fooling around with her. And you get all these like, mental images in your brain, you know, like Elle MacPherson, or that girl at the Xerox place....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: With the belly-button ring? Oh, muhawa!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, And then all of the sudden your Mom pops into your head. And your like 'Mom, get outta here!' You know, but of course, like, after that you can't possibly think of anything else, and you can't, you know, stop what your doing. So it's kinda like, you're, you know. You know... . You don't know!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Your Mom, your telling me, your telling me, about your Mom, what is the matter with you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You said...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I said 'share' not 'scare'. Go sit over there! .

utterance.content: We're baack!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you guys doing together?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Joey and Janice's DAY OF FUN!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah. We went to a Mets game, we got Chinese food, and you know, I love this woman. You have got competition buddy.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I just came by to give you a kiss, I have to go pick up the baby, so. I'll see you later sweetheart, you too Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You still can't stand her can you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm sorry man, I tired, I really did.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you know, I appreciate you giving it a shot.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But, hey, look, you know the good thing is, is that we spent the whole day together and I survived, and what's even more amazing, so did she. It was bat day at Shea Stadium.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I guess that's something.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No man, that's huge! Now, I know I can stand to be around her, which means I get to hang out with you, which is kinda the whole point, anyway.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hey, Chandler, we, ah, we stopped by the coffee shop and ran into Ross.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, if it makes you feel any better, I do it too.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, I always picture your Mom when I'm having sex.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi, Dad, what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Well, it's your mother's bridge night so I thought that I would come into the city for a little Monicuddle. Since when did you start smoking cigars?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't, I just, I just like the smell of them. So, uh, what are you really doing here Dad?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Well, I just wanted to make sure you were okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What makes you think that I might not be okay?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: I saw Richard.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: So, how are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm fine, just a little tired, I'm okay. How's Richard doing?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: You don't wanna know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, I really, really do.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Well, he's doing terrible!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Worse than when he broke up with Barbara.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're not just saying that are you?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: No, the man is a mess.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Was he crying?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, do you think he was waiting 'til after you left, so he could cry?

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Maybe.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think so.

utterance.speaker: Mr. Geller
utterance.content: Honey, relationships are hard. Like with your Mom and me. You know after we graduated college we broke up for a while. However,
